response.overview: Mordprozeß Mary Dugan (1931) is a German courtroom drama about Mary Dugan, a showgirl accused of murdering her wealthy lover. The trial reveals dark secrets about their relationship, challenging societal prejudices as her defense fights to prove her innocence. Directed by Fritz Wendhausen, the film is a suspenseful exploration of truth and justice.
response.title: Mordprozeß Mary Dugan
